markdownRemark.html:
1st attempt at trying out ReactJS + GatsbyJS + Github Pages for blogging!

  1. Gatsby Documentation
  2. Gatsby Starter Blog
  3. Gatsby with Github Pages

Gatsby purely uses markdown for blog posts.

CSS Styles are used too, of course. But that is a concern for another day.

frontmatter.title: First Entry
frontmatter.description: My 1st attempt at trying out a new way of blogging.
